name: Priority support
description: Instead of spending days on Github issues, send us a direct message, and we will get you up and running in no time.
bulletPoints: Private Github repo for submitting issues

name: On-demand Zoom calls
description: Get a sneak peak of upcoming features, ask questions, and clarify your doubts during an hour long Zoom call.
bulletPoints: Try new features and provide feedback

name: Access to our paid stuff
description: Download our paid content and premium packages for free and share them with everyone inside your company.

name: Support development
description: Since AdonisJS is an independent open-source project, we rely on companies like you to keep the lights on.
